alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:09AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Coahoma, southwestern Tunica and northwestern Quitman Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dublin, or near Clarksdale, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Marks, Jonestown, Sledge, Belen, Dublin, Darling, Kings, Dundee, Coahoma, Lyon, Lula, Falcon, Mattson, Rudyard, Moon, Barksdale, Jeffries, Sabino and Clover Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
